actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to establish the National Commission on Gay and Lesbian Youth Suicide Prevention, and for other purposes.
short_title: Gay and Lesbian Youth Suicide Prevention Act
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Gay and Lesbian Youth Suicide Prevention Act - Establishes the National Commission on Gay and Lesbian Youth Suicide Prevention to combat the epidemic of suicide among gay and lesbian youth and to advise the Department of Health and Human Services and other Federal and State youth service agencies concerning how to include the concerns of gay and lesbian youth within existing suicide prevention policies, programs, and research.

titles.title: Gay and Lesbian Youth Suicide Prevention Act
A bill to establish the National Commission on Gay and Lesbian Youth Suicide Prevention, and for other purposes.
